elements.description:
`<vaadin-date-picker-light>` is a customizable version of the `<vaadin-date-picker>` providing
only the scrollable month calendar view and leaving the input field definition to the user.

To create a custom input field, you need to add a child element which has a two-way
data-bindable property representing the input value. The property name is expected
to be `bindValue` by default. See the example below for a simplest possible example
using an `<input>` element extended with `iron-input`.

```html
<vaadin-date-picker-light>
  <iron-input>
    <input/>
  </iron-input>
</vaadin-date-picker-light>
```

If you are using other custom input fields like `<paper-input>`, you
need to define the name of value property using the `attrForValue` property.

```html
<vaadin-date-picker-light attr-for-value="value">
  <paper-input label="Birthday">
  </paper-input>
</vaadin-date-picker-light>
```

properties.name: _selectedDate
properties.description: The current selected date.

properties.name: value
properties.description:
The value for this element.

Supported date formats:
- ISO 8601 `"YYYY-MM-DD"` (default)
- 6-digit extended ISO 8601 `"+YYYYYY-MM-DD"`, `"-YYYYYY-MM-DD"`

properties.name: required
properties.description: Set to true to mark the input as required.

properties.name: name
properties.description: The name of this element.

properties.name: initialPosition
properties.description:
Date which should be visible when there is no value selected.

The same date formats as for the `value` property are supported.

properties.name: label
properties.description: The label for this element.

properties.name: opened
properties.description: Set true to open the date selector overlay.

properties.name: showWeekNumbers
properties.description:
Set true to display ISO-8601 week numbers in the calendar. Notice that
displaying week numbers is only supported when `i18n.firstDayOfWeek`
is 1 (Monday).

properties.name: _touchPrevented
properties.description: 'touch' to value 'auto' in order to prevent them from clipping the dropdown. iOS only.

properties.name: i18n
min
properties.description:
The earliest date that can be selected. All earlier dates will be disabled.

Supported date formats:
- ISO 8601 `"YYYY-MM-DD"` (default)
- 6-digit extended ISO 8601 `"+YYYYYY-MM-DD"`, `"-YYYYYY-MM-DD"`

properties.name: max
properties.description:
The latest date that can be selected. All later dates will be disabled.

Supported date formats:
- ISO 8601 `"YYYY-MM-DD"` (default)
- 6-digit extended ISO 8601 `"+YYYYYY-MM-DD"`, `"-YYYYYY-MM-DD"`

properties.name: _minDate
properties.description: The earliest date that can be selected. All earlier dates will be disabled.

properties.name: _maxDate
properties.description: The latest date that can be selected. All later dates will be disabled.

properties.name: attrForValue
properties.description:
Name of the two-way data-bindable property representing the
value of the custom input field.

methods.name: validate
methods.description: Returns true if `value` is valid, and sets the `invalid` flag appropriately.

params.name: value
params.description: Value to validate. Optional, defaults to user's input value.

return.desc: True if the value is valid and sets the `invalid` flag appropriately

methods.name: checkValidity
methods.description:
Returns true if the current input value satisfies all constraints (if any)

Override the `checkValidity` method for custom validations.

params.name: value
params.description: Value to validate. Optional, defaults to the selected date.

return.desc: True if the value is valid

elements.description:
`<vaadin-date-picker>` is a date selection field which includes a scrollable
month calendar view.
```html
<vaadin-date-picker label="Birthday"></vaadin-date-picker>
```
```js
datePicker.value = '2016-03-02';
```
When the selected `value` is changed, a `value-changed` event is triggered.


### Styling

The following shadow DOM parts are available for styling:

Part name | Description | Theme for Element
----------------|----------------|----------------
`text-field` | Input element | vaadin-date-picker
`clear-button` | Clear button | vaadin-date-picker
`toggle-button` | Toggle button | vaadin-date-picker
`overlay` | The overlay element | vaadin-date-picker
`overlay` | The overlay element | vaadin-date-picker-light
`overlay-header` | Fullscreen mode header | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`label` | Fullscreen mode value/label | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`clear-button` | Fullscreen mode clear button | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`toggle-button` | Fullscreen mode toggle button | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`years-toggle-button` | Fullscreen mode years scroller toggle | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`months` | Months scroller | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`years` | Years scroller | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`toolbar` | Footer bar with buttons | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`today-button` | Today button | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`cancel-button` | Cancel button | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`month` | Month calendar | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`year-number` | Year number | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`year-separator` | Year separator | vaadin-date-picker-overlay-content
`month-header` | Month title | vaadin-month-calendar
`weekdays` | Weekday container | vaadin-month-calendar
`weekday` | Weekday element | vaadin-month-calendar
`week-numbers` | Week numbers container | vaadin-month-calendar
`week-number` | Week number element | vaadin-month-calendar
`date` | Date element | vaadin-month-calendar

See [ThemableMixin – how to apply styles for shadow parts](https://github.com/vaadin/vaadin-themable-mixin/wiki)

The following state attributes are available for styling:

Attribute    | Description | Part name
-------------|-------------|------------
`invalid` | Set when the element is invalid | :host
`opened` | Set when the date selector overlay is opened | :host
`readonly` | Set when the element is readonly | :host

If you want to replace the default input field with a custom implementation, you should use the
[`<vaadin-date-picker-light>`](#vaadin-date-picker-light) element.

staticMethods.name: _getISOWeekNumber
staticMethods.description: Get ISO 8601 week number for the given date.

staticMethods.name: _dateEquals
staticMethods.description: Check if two dates are equal.

return.desc: True if the given date objects refer to the same date

staticMethods.name: _dateAllowed
staticMethods.description: Check if the given date is in the range of allowed dates.

return.desc: True if the date is in the range

staticMethods.name: _getClosestDate
staticMethods.description: Get closest date from array of dates.

params.name: date
params.description: The date to compare dates with

staticMethods.name: _extractDateParts
staticMethods.description:
Extracts the basic component parts of a date (day, month and year)
to the expected format.

elements.description:
The overlay element.

### Styling

See [`<vaadin-overlay>` documentation](https://github.com/vaadin/vaadin-overlay/blob/master/vaadin-overlay.html)
for `<vaadin-date-picker-overlay>` parts.

See [ThemableMixin – how to apply styles for shadow parts](https://github.com/vaadin/vaadin-themable-mixin/wiki)
elements.name: VaadinDatePickerOverlayElement

properties.name: month
properties.description:
A `Date` object defining the month to be displayed. Only year and
month properties are actually used.

properties.name: selectedDate
properties.description: A `Date` object for the currently selected date.

properties.name: focusedDate
properties.description: A `Date` object for the currently focused date.

properties.name: ignoreTaps
properties.description: Flag stating whether taps on the component should be ignored.

properties.name: minDate
properties.description: The earliest date that can be selected. All earlier dates will be disabled.

properties.name: maxDate
properties.description: The latest date that can be selected. All later dates will be disabled.

methods.name: _isDisabled
methods.description: Returns true if all the dates in the month are out of the allowed range

attributes.name: month
attributes.description:
A `Date` object defining the month to be displayed. Only year and
month properties are actually used.

attributes.name: selected-date
attributes.description: A `Date` object for the currently selected date.

attributes.name: focused-date
attributes.description: A `Date` object for the currently focused date.

attributes.name: ignore-taps
attributes.description: Flag stating whether taps on the component should be ignored.

attributes.name: min-date
attributes.description: The earliest date that can be selected. All earlier dates will be disabled.

attributes.name: max-date
attributes.description: The latest date that can be selected. All later dates will be disabled.

properties.name: bufferSize
properties.description:
Count of individual items in each buffer.
The scroller has 2 buffers altogether so bufferSize of 20
will result in 40 buffered DOM items in total.
Changing after initialization not supported.

properties.name: _initialScroll
properties.description:
The amount of initial scroll top. Needed in order for the
user to be able to scroll backwards.

properties.name: _initialIndex
properties.description: The index/position mapped at _initialScroll point.

attributes.name: buffer-size
attributes.description:
Count of individual items in each buffer.
The scroller has 2 buffers altogether so bufferSize of 20
will result in 40 buffered DOM items in total.
Changing after initialization not supported.

properties.name: selectedDate
properties.description: The value for this element.

properties.name: focusedDate
properties.description: Date value which is focused using keyboard.

properties.name: initialPosition
properties.description: Date which should be visible when there is no value selected.

properties.name: minDate
properties.description: The earliest date that can be selected. All earlier dates will be disabled.

properties.name: maxDate
properties.description: The latest date that can be selected. All later dates will be disabled.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Input label

methods.name: scrollToDate
methods.description: Scrolls the list to the given Date.

methods.name: revealDate
methods.description: Scrolls the month and year scrollers enough to reveal the given date.
